user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable and reliable underwear that fits well and does not cause discomfort.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable underwear that would provide control and prevent muffin top. However, the product did not meet my expectations, especially for my body type, which led to disappointment.

I wanted a comfortable and modest style of underwear that would stay in place and not cause discomfort. While the design was appealing, the quality issues with the material made me reconsider my choice.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer true comfort and support, especially in clothing items like bras and pants. I value features such as a good fit, soft and breathable materials, and designs that accommodate my body shape without being clingy or unflattering. I appreciate items that are versatile and can be styled for different occasions, as well as those that maintain their quality after washing. On the other hand, I dislike products that are poorly sized, especially those that are too large or clingy, as well as items made from low-quality materials that do not hold up over time. I also find it frustrating when clothing does not fit well in specific areas, such as the waist or armholes, leading to discomfort or the need for constant adjustments.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and reliable underwear that fits well and does not cause discomfort. within my expected price range: [8.46, 12.96]
What specific style of underwear do you usually prefer, such as briefs, boxers, boxer briefs, or another style?
I prefer underwear styles that offer good coverage and support, like briefs or boyshorts. Comfort and fit are my top priorities when choosing underwear. What do you recommend?

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Assorted Boyshort Underwear> / Item ID: B0BB767B8M / Price: $10.49 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["The Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear come in a convenient pack of 6 pairs. They offer it all-comfort, fit and style. You'll also love features like the breathable ultra soft ring spun cotton and an ultra soft, plush back waistband that won't pinch or bind and no-ride-up leg bands that stay in place. Plus, tag-free label means freedom from annoying, scratchy tags. Designed with excellent coverage, these panties come in an assorted color pack, colors may be different than shown in the image. The boyshort style provides full coverage front and back.. Don't compromise on comfort, style and fit, when you can have all three with the Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Men's Tagless White Briefs with ComfortFlex Waistband-Multiple Packs Available> / Item ID: B09J23VG1K / Price: $7.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Briefs'] / Description: ["When it's time to stock up on basic white briefs, Hanes® has the ones you want. These soft, cotton-blend men's briefs are knit from Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. You'll really appreciate the ComfortFlex® waistband that moves with you and keeps its shape wash after wash without pinching or binding. These ultra comfortable, full-cut, cotton-blend briefs are also tagless so there's no annoying tag to bunch up or itch. With a traditional open fly, this cool, breathable underwear comes in a convenient 6-pack of all white so stocking up is a no-brainer."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes Boys' Undershirt, EcoSmart Short Sleeve Crew Shirts, Multiple Packs Available> / Item ID: B07TCJMHYN / Price: $9.98 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Boys', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Undershirts'] / Description: ["Hanes® EcoSmart® boys' undershirts are crafted from a lightweight 50/50 cotton polyester-blend fabric that features a portion of recycled fibers. The feel-good style of these white boys t-shirts offers moisture-wicking technology, keeping him cool and fresh no matter how hard he plays. Double-ply neckband is just one of the sturdy details in boys cotton shirts that are made to last. Even better, these boys' short sleeve shirts are preshrunk for a fit that stays true. This comfortable style is finished with a smooth Tagless® interior for itch-free comfort. Hanes® boys' undershirts come in a convenient 5-pack so you can stock up with ease."]
